HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: PPL: od 90 Kč, Zásilkovna domů: od 80 Kč, Česká pošta: od 105 Kč. Zdarma nad 1990 Kč.
HOME_DELIVERY.free_delivery_limit: Doprava při nákupu zboží nad 1990 Kč a platbou bankovním převodem nebo online kartou je ZDARMA

express_delivery.delivery_time: Doručení v den objednání do 13:00 (pondělí - pátek) v Praze.

BULKY_PRODUCT_HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: Cena dopravy jízdního kola po ČR s platbou bankovním převodem, či platební kartou při nákupu zboží na e-shopu 400 Kč.

PARCEL_SHOPS.pricing: PPL výdejní místo: 60 Kč. Zásilkovna: 65 Kč (předem), 110 Kč (dobírka).
PARCEL_SHOPS.free_delivery_limit: Při objednávce nad 1990 Kč je poštovné zdarma

PARCEL_LOCKERS.free_delivery_limit: Při objednávce nad 1990 Kč je poštovné zdarma

locations: Ski a Bike Centrum Radotín, Na Betonce 114/2, Praha 5 – Radotín, 153 00

SUMMARY: DELIVERY OPTIONS: The e-shop offers a wide range of delivery methods including home delivery, bulky item delivery for bicycles, parcel shop/locker pickup, and in-store pickup. PROVIDERS: Main carriers are PPL, Zásilkovna, and Česká pošta for standard parcels, and Toptrans for bikes. PRICING: Standard delivery starts from 60 Kč. Free shipping is available for orders over 1990 Kč (excluding bikes). Bike shipping costs a flat rate of 400 Kč. The cash on delivery (COD) surcharge is consistently 45 Kč where available. RESTRICTIONS: Zásilkovna services are limited to smaller parcels (max 70 cm). Bicycles are handled exclusively by Toptrans. NOTABLE FEATURES: A same-day express courier service is available for customers in Prague for 250 Kč (Mon-Fri, order by 13:00). Bicycles are professionally assembled and adjusted before being packed for shipping. In-store pickup is available at multiple locations in Prague and Brno. WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information is presented on a dedicated, clearly structured page. It effectively details the services, providers, pricing tiers, and specific conditions for different product types (e.g., bikes vs. standard items). The information is comprehensive and easy for customers to understand.
